QuestData.Title: Ossein Enchantment
QuestData.Description:
A potent blade requires potent components. I know of something that would suit our needs.
Recently a monstrosity trained by the constructs was snared by our soldiers at the eastern side of our stronghold. Vyraz insists we can siphon "intelligence" from the beast's mind.
Hmph. The will of the Primus trumps the desires of an ambitious baron!
The bones of that beast would forge the perfect hilt for this blade. I say you lay claim to them.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A captured beast from the House of Constructs. Nigh impossible to subdue.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Marrowjaw and collect an Empowered Bone from its corpse.
QuestData.RewardText: Good! I knew that beast would prove no challenge for you.
